title: TrueFPS — Procedural First-Person & Replicated FPS Prototype
summary: Custom AnimGraph node driving TrueFPS (spine aim-offset, sway, recoil, blocking, lean) + replicated FFA shooter with attachments.

title: Spatial Inventory — Replicated Grid & Component-Based Interaction
summary: Replicated UObject-driven grid inventory with rotation/placement and a flexible interaction system; simple UMG UI.

title: Flag Capture — Multiplayer Technical Test (UE5)
summary: Phase-driven CTF built from UE5 FP template: replicated timers/teams/scores, team-aware spawns, controller state machine, flag events, and UI hooks; brief-compliant with BP limited to data/UI.

title: FPS Prototype — ALS-Based First-Person Feel
summary: ALS locomotion + custom first-person presentation; replicated projectile weapons, throwables (grenade/C4), and a generic item system.

title: Ladder System — Replicated Climbing & Procedural IK
summary: Replicated ladder climbing with procedural rung IK for hands/feet, modular ladder actor via splines, climb-from-top, slide, and pipe support.

title: Parasuit — Skydive & Parachute (Replicated)
summary: Replicated skydiving + parachute with dedicated Animation Instances, auto-open, HUD, dash/roll, and velocity prediction.

title: Parkour — Vault, Slide & Zipline (Replicated)
summary: Replicated vault/slide with AnimNotifies and zipline (vertical, oscillation, IK, view lock, interaction widget).

title: Swim — Water Volumes, Buoyancy & Movement (Replicated)
summary: Replicated swim component with water volumes, buoyancy helper, horizontal/vertical swim controls, and animation integration.

title: Cover System — Lean, Corners & Auto-Cover (Replicated)
summary: Replicated cover with line-trace detection, corners, leaning (manual/auto), shoulder swap, cover change (motion warping/roll/auto-walk), and widget.

title: Grapple — Player Interactions & Assassination (Replicated)
summary: Replicated two-action player interaction system (ally carry/drag, enemy grab/assassinate) with synced anims, IK hands, and semi-ragdoll on the target.

title: Grappling Hook — Physics Pull & One-Handed Use (Replicated)
summary: Throw a hook to any surface; on hit, apply physics pull to the player. One-handed state machine (masked) so weapons remain usable.

title: Reima — First/Third-Person Combat Prototype
summary: ALS retargeted to UE5 Manny/Metahuman, FP/TP switch, spatial equipment inventory, holster/attach system, limp overlay, explosives & bullet physics, damage/death, and a drivable car rewritten from the Matrix demo.

title: Bullet System — Advanced Ballistics & Replicated Weapons
summary: Teaching prototype: sub-stepped ballistics with drag & wind, penetration/ricochet, pooling; replicated weapon actor and FP sway.

title: Bunny Hopping — FPS Sandbox/Prototype
summary: Replicated FPS/TP system with GoldSrc-style bunny hopping, dual-mesh first/third-person pipeline, hotbar-driven inventory & weapons, team-vs-team battle mode with match phases, and a sandbox mode with UI overlays.
